warnings.name: auto
warnings.prose: The scrolling box is scrolled in an instant fashion.

warnings.name: smooth
warnings.prose: The scrolling box is scrolled in a smooth fashion using a user-agent-defined timing function over a user-agent-defined period of time. User agents should follow platform conventions, if any.
